suite.name: Visual Login Test

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

test.name: Login Screen Validation

kw.name: Navigates To
kw.doc: Leads the test to the desired page and initialize the RbotEyes library

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Visual Test Comparison
kw.doc: Check if the user is redirected to the correct using screenshot

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Login with valid user and password
kw.doc: Check if the user can login with valid inputs and change the language option

kw.name: Select Element
kw.doc: Keyword responsible for the click function on an element and waiting for the element to be visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Insert User
kw.doc: Keyword responsible for input a user on an element and waiting for the element to be visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Insert Pass
kw.doc: Keyword responsible for input a pass on an element and waiting for the element to be visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Dropdown List by Value
kw.doc: Keyword responsible for the selection of an option in a dropdown list

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Select From List By Value
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``values``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=languageIdSelect' by value en_us.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Validate Page Content
kw.doc: Keyword responsible for check string content in the page

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

kw.name: Visual Test Comparison
kw.doc: Check if the user is redirected to the correct using screenshot

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Compare Images
